visionaryStatements.text: I have affinity for tackling and creatively solving the biggest, most complex problems.
I am constantly generating new ideas i never run out.
I am a great leader. People tend to follow me.
I am highly optimistic in my outlook.
My natural perspective is oriented toward things that are external to the company, big-picture or futuristic thinking.
I am the creator of, and champion for, the company Vision.
I sometimes find it difficult to translate my Vision into something that others understand. They don't seem to get it.
I eventually have the "right" idea. It may come from having a large volume of different ideas or a small number that I feel strongly about.
I have zero patience for putting operational policy, structure, and repeatability systems in place.
I naturally think about the future of th e industry, our product or our service, what's coming, and how we can best position the company to take advantage of it.
I am naturally insightful, skilled at deductive, reasoning, and highly innovative in thinking of ways to make ideas bigger and better.
I don't like being held accountable or being told what to do. I find it challenging to establish genuine accountability in my company.
I embrace and enjoy the role of being the engine for big, new, breakthrough ideas, the spark, getting them started.
I embrace and enjoy the role of solving the biggest problems faced by the company.
I embrace and enjoy the role of being responsible for a few large, key strategic, relationships (vendor, client, banking,industry).
I embrace and enjoy the role of selling and closing big deals.

I struggle with follow-through. I lose interest in finishing new ideas. I don't have patience or interest for a lot of detail. I wish people would get to the point. I get bored and distracted very easily.
I embrace and enjoy the role of being the "entrepreneurial spark plug," providing passion and inspiration.
I embrace and enjoy the role of researching and developing new products and services.
I embrace and enjoy the role of leading the way on learning and discovery that advances the organization.
